examples.korean: That means I've got my phone in one hand, work in the other and I only have a few minutes to grab food. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 내가 한손엔 핸드폰을 들고 한손으로는 업무를 하느라 끼니를 때울 시간은 몇분에 불과함을 의미한다. examples.korean: Is this a US thing? examples.korean: He took her hand in his firm warm clasp. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 따뜻한 손으로 그녀의 손을 꼭 움켜잡았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
